features: 【2.5D screen car navigation】The first 2.5D curved curved screen with a wider viewing angle, a more visible screen and better light transmission, allowing clear mapping even in sunlight.

【Intelligent Navigation System】Smart Car Navigator provides you with speed warnings so you can easily avoid tickets; Car Navigator can identify nearby POIs such as gas stations, rest areas, etc. Speed information, remaining distance and arrival time will be displayed on the navigator to give you a better driving experience.

【Lifetime Map Updated for Free】XGODY 7-inch gps navigation for car is pre-installed with the latest 2023 North America maps, including US Canada Mexico maps with 2D/3D map display. If you need to update the latest maps, please contact us to download. (Maps available for download but not pre-installed: Europe, South America, Australia, etc.)

【Customized navigation routes】Smart GPS can customize your exclusive route according to your vehicle type, avoiding height and weight restrictions, traffic congestion routes, etc.; navigation supports multiple navigation modes - truck, car, bus, pedestrian, cab, bicycle, emergency, etc., for your diverse trips and escorts.

【After Sales Service】XGODY navigation, supports 1-year warranty and 30-day money-back guarantee, providing you with high-quality after-sales service. If you have any questions about the product, please contact us via Amazon message, we will reply you within 24 hours.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Xgody Global Professional GPS Navigation 2.5D curved screen: the first 7-inch 2.5D curved screen, wider viewing angles, higher clarity, and a smoother touch, so you no longer have eye fatigue.Lifetime map updates: 2D/3D map views, no internet connection required, ready to use, all North American country maps are already pre-installed.Multi-language: Support many world languages with clear voice output. Convenient for you to travel the world.Vehicle Points of Interest: Find the right gas stations, rest areas and service centers. Xgody Professional Truck Navigation offers a number of POIs designed for larger vehicles.7-inch gps navigation with stand: Xgody truck navigation see directions clearly on a bright, sunlight-readable display.Multimedia: MPEG4, MP3, JPEG, AVI, WMA and other playable formats. 8GB RAM (expandable) and 256MB RAM. The device supports MicroSD data carriers (up to approx. 32GB).7 vehicle modes switching: truck, car, bus, pedestrian, cab, bike, emergency. It can meet your different navigation needs.Multiple search methods: by zip code, full address, partial address, directory, points of interest, favorite places to visit or previous search history (recent destinations).

Lifetime map update of the Americas for 2023 Xgody navigation are installed the latest maps: the United States, Canada, the United States and other American countries have been pre-installed the latest maps, Europe, Africa and other countries map need to contact to download.

Truck Gps Customized Routing: You only need to enter the dimensions of your truck such as length, width, height, weight, axle number and load capacity. It can avoid the streets with height, width and weight restrictions for you. So as to help you reach your destination smoothly. This is the navigation assistant for truck drivers.

Intelligent navigation device Navigation comes with speeding warning, as well as traffic light alert, which will avoid unnecessary fines on the way and make your driving easier. 2D 3D map view Lifetime map update. Offline maps, easy to use without internet connection. Xgody navi provides lifetime map update service, you don't need to spend extra money to update the map data. FM transmitter Not an FM radio, but an FM transmitter. This sends the sound of the navigation to the car radio, which is louder, so you don't miss any of the voice instructions. Steps: 1.FM Transmitter→ click "Use FM"，Tune it to the same channel as in the car. Support 12-24V Xgody gps is suitable for all types of vehicles, such as: cars, trucks, bicycles, buses, taxis, etc. if only vehicles are 12V to 24V and you can use XGODY navigation device with confidence.

best gift Navigation is a great gift that can be used for normal travel use or for cross-country travel. The first 2.5D curved curved screen gives the best sense of visual experience and travel experience. It can be used to give to husbands, fathers, friends and other driving people, and is the best choice for Christmas, Halloween, Valentine's Day and other holiday gifts, so they will never get lost again when traveling.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars It works when it comes on
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. pretty nice item with the exception that its SO hard to turn on. over 2-1/2 minutes of pushing the power button......But it turns off with the power button, immediately.nice informative screen EXCEPT....the speed limit icon is wrong ( shows 55mph spedlimit when its actually 70) so its always warning that your speeding. there is no way I found to verify your actual speed like my old Garmin Nuvi does.Tech support NEVER did contact me!everything else seems fine and Dandy

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love it but on my Home Screen there is no Bluetooth, I try everything I can’t find Bluetooth
